from product_sku_config_draft a left join product_sku_config_spare_warehouse_draft b on a.config_code = b.config_code left join product_sku c on a.sku_code = c.sku_code where a.del_flag = 0 and a.apply_show = 0 and a.company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
